campsites.name: Parque de Campismo da Torreira
campsites.description: The Torreira campsite is a beautiful campsite located in Aveiro near to Torreira beach. This campsite has a pool, bungalows, allows campervans, but does not allow animals.

bungalows.description: Comfortable bungalow located in a peaceful environment. It supports at most 3 people.
Comfortable bungalow located in a peaceful environment. It supports at most 4 people.

campervans.description: The Torreira campsite allows you to park your campervan on a peaceful and beutiful place close to the ocean. This campervan park (area A) has space for 10 campervan.
campervans.card_description: Parking lot at area A with 10 parking places

campervans.description: The Torreira campsite allows you to park your campervan on a peaceful and beutiful place. This campervan park (area B) has space for 20 campervan.
campervans.card_description: Parking lot at area B with 20 parking places

campervans.description: The Torreira campsite allows you to park your campervan on a peaceful and beutiful place. This campervan park (area C) has space for 40 campervan.
campervans.card_description: Parking lot at area C with 40 parking places

tents.card_description: Place with 15 m² for a tent
tents.description: The Torreira campsite allows you to bring your own tent and use our peaceful and beautiful place to live your best moments. This place has 15 m² to puto all of yout stuff!
